financial_terms.taxes_and_fees: Repossession charges, dishonour charges, processing fees and statutory taxes

lease_specific_terms.wear_and_tear_policy: Borrower must maintain the vehicle in good condition and pay for repairs

loan_specific_terms.prepayment_penalty: Prepayment charges apply on outstanding amount as per facility documents
loan_specific_terms.late_fee_rules: Additional interest on overdue amounts and dishonour charges for failed payments

contract_metadata.vendor_source: TATA CAPITAL Master Terms and Conditions (Auto Loan)
